definition: ruined army, defeated general (idiom); scattered remnants
to destroy/to spoil/to ruin/to injure/cruel/oppressive/savage/brutal/incomplete/disabled/to remain/to survive/remnant/surplus
to defeat/to damage/to lose (to an opponent)/to fail/to wither
will/shall/to use/to take/to checkmate/just a short while ago/(introduces object of main verb, used in the same way as 把[ba3])

sentences.english: They encourage internal competition as the way to weed out the weakest .
sentences.chinese: 他們鼓勵內部競爭，從而淘汰組織的殘兵敗將。

sentences.english: He has come tomusterthe beaten remnant soldiers.
sentences.chinese: 他前來收拾這些殘兵敗將。

sentences.english: He HAS come to muster the beaten generals and remnant soldiers.
sentences.chinese: 他前來收拾這些殘兵敗將。
